resources.string: Are you sure you wish to exit the game? If you do, your score will not be recorded.

Move your ship and shoot the asteroids to stay alive!

The more asteroids you shoot, the higher your score will get, but be careful because larger asteroids can split into smaller ones.

Touch the right-hand half of the screen to rotate your ship clockwise and the left-hand half rotate anti-clockwise.

The arrow makes your ship accelerate in the direction it's pointing. Be careful with this!

The fire button shoots a projectile in the direction you're pointing.

Use the button at the top of the screen to mute and un-mute the game.
